entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 11:21 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain at times mixed with wet snow near noon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
